mapper.sql: t.DRUGID, t.PRODUCTID, t.DRUGNAMEID, t.DRUGNAME, t.DRUGGOODSNAME, t.DRUGFORMID, t.DRUGFORM, t.DRUGSPECID, t.DRUGSPEC, t.DRUGFACTOR, t.DRUGUNITID, t.DRUGUNIT, t.PREPARATIONUNITID, t.BUSINESSBRIBERY, t.DRUGDISTRIBUTION, t.ISELECTRONICCODE, t.ELECTRONICCODE, t.ELECTRONICCODEUNIT, t.ELECTRONICCODEURL, t.DRUGQUALITYSTANDARD, t.SURVEYREPORTID, t.SURVEYREPORTDATE, t.NEWDRUGCODE, t.DRUGSTANDARDCODE, t.DRUGANSPRM, t.DRUGREMARK, t.ADDTIME, t.ADDUSERID, t.DRUGFORMDESCRIPTION, t.MIDDLEPACK, t.BIGPACK, t.DRUGORIGIN, t.CATALOGTYPE, t.ISUSING, t.ISURBMI, t.ISNRCMS, t.ISEMERGENCYMEDICINE, t.ISCLINICALSMALL, t.COMPANYNAME_TB, t.DRUGCODE, t.DRUGTYPE, t.DRUGENGLISHNAME, t.DRUGSOURCE, t.MINCOMPANYNAME, t.MATERIALNO, t.MINDRUGREPORTRESULT, t.REPORTDATE, t.REPORTRESULT, t.ISENTRUST, t.ENTRUSTCODE, t.ENTRUSTCOMPANYNAME, t.ELECTRONICSUPERVISION, t.ABROADCOMPANYNAME, t.BIDCOMPANYNAME, t.DRUGCAPACITY, t.MEDICALINSURANCETYPE, t.MEDICALINSURANCECODE, t.PRICETYPE, t.GOVERNMENTPRICETYPE, t.GOVERNMENTPRICE, t.IS_BASIC_DRUG, t.MIN_PACK_UNIT, t.MIN_REPORT_CODE, t.ID, t.REGID, t.ENTEREDCOMNAME, t.INDICATION, t.ISGMPVAILD, t.ENTRUSTCOMPANYID, t.REGTYPE, t.REGPERFORMSTANDARD, t.REGPERFORMSTANDARDCODE, t.YIELDS, t.ISDRUGLABEL, t.PRICE, t.COMPRICE, t.PATENTTYPE, t.PACK, t.ISUSINGREASON, t.MEDICINEMODELSTANDARD, t.OUTLOOKCSTANDARD, t.GOODSCLASSIFICATION, t.HASINSTRUCTIONS, t.HASPACK, t.INSTRUCTIONSIMG, t.ENTITYIMG, t.ISCOUNTRYFAMOUS, t.ISPROVINCEFAMOUS, t.INSTRUCTIONSID, t.ENTITYID, t.ISBARGAINING, t.MAXRETAILPRICE, t.FARMGATEPRICE, t.RETAILPRICE, t.NMPACKPRICE, t.ISFZY, t.ISDJY, t.IS_BASIC_DRUG_OLD, t.YPID, t.ISPILOT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE_DRUGINFO( DRUGID , PRODUCTID , DRUGNAMEID , DRUGNAME , DRUGGOODSNAME , DRUGFORMID , DRUGFORM , DRUGSPECID , DRUGSPEC , DRUGFACTOR , DRUGUNITID , DRUGUNIT , PREPARATIONUNITID , PREPARATIONUNIT , DRUGMATERIALID , DRUGMATERIAL , COMPANYID_TB , COMPANYID_SC , COMPANYNAME_SC , QUALITYLEVELSID , REGCARDID , SOURCEOFFEED , TYPECHARACTERISTICS , RESERVECONDITION , DRUGVALIDITY , DRUGROUTE , ISGMPNOTICE , GMPID , ISLISENCENOTICE , LISENCECODE , LICENSENUMBERDATE , INTERNATIONALCERTIFICATION , IMPORTCERTIFICATE , REGCODE , REGDATE , PRODUCTQUALITY , BUSINESSBRIBERY , DRUGDISTRIBUTION , ISELECTRONICCODE , ELECTRONICCODE , ELECTRONICCODEUNIT , ELECTRONICCODEURL , DRUGQUALITYSTANDARD , SURVEYREPORTID , SURVEYREPORTDATE , NEWDRUGCODE , DRUGSTANDARDCODE , DRUGANSPRM , DRUGREMARK , ADDTIME , ADDUSERID , DRUGFORMDESCRIPTION , MIDDLEPACK , BIGPACK , DRUGORIGIN , CATALOGTYPE , ISUSING , ISURBMI , ISNRCMS , ISEMERGENCYMEDICINE , ISCLINICALSMALL , COMPANYNAME_TB , DRUGCODE , DRUGTYPE , DRUGENGLISHNAME , DRUGSOURCE , MINCOMPANYNAME , MATERIALNO , MINDRUGREPORTRESULT , REPORTDATE , REPORTRESULT , ISENTRUST , ENTRUSTCODE , ENTRUSTCOMPANYNAME , ELECTRONICSUPERVISION , ABROADCOMPANYNAME , BIDCOMPANYNAME , DRUGCAPACITY , MEDICALINSURANCETYPE , MEDICALINSURANCECODE , PRICETYPE , GOVERNMENTPRICETYPE , GOVERNMENTPRICE , IS_BASIC_DRUG , MIN_PACK_UNIT , MIN_REPORT_CODE , ID , REGID , ENTEREDCOMNAME , INDICATION , ISGMPVAILD , ENTRUSTCOMPANYID , REGTYPE , REGPERFORMSTANDARD , REGPERFORMSTANDARDCODE , YIELDS , ISDRUGLABEL , PRICE , COMPRICE , PATENTTYPE , PACK , ISUSINGREASON , MEDICINEMODELSTANDARD , OUTLOOKCSTANDARD , GOODSCLASSIFICATION , HASINSTRUCTIONS , HASPACK , INSTRUCTIONSIMG , ENTITYIMG , ISCOUNTRYFAMOUS , ISPROVINCEFAMOUS , INSTRUCTIONSID , ENTITYID , ISBARGAINING , MAXRETAILPRICE , FARMGATEPRICE , RETAILPRICE , NMPACKPRICE , ISFZY , ISDJY , IS_BASIC_DRUG_OLD , YPID ) VALUES ( #{drugid} , #{productid} , #{drugnameid} , #{drugname} , #{druggoodsname} , #{drugformid} , #{drugform} , #{drugspecid} , #{drugspec} , #{drugfactor} , #{drugunitid} , #{drugunit} , #{preparationunitid} , #{preparationunit} , #{drugmaterialid} , #{drugmaterial} , #{companyidTb} , #{companyidSc} , #{companynameSc} , #{qualitylevelsid} , #{regcardid} , #{sourceoffeed} , #{typecharacteristics} , #{reservecondition} , #{drugvalidity} , #{drugroute} , #{isgmpnotice} , #{gmpid} , #{islisencenotice} , #{lisencecode} , #{licensenumberdate} , #{internationalcertification} , #{importcertificate} , #{regcode} , #{regdate} , #{productquality} , #{businessbribery} , #{drugdistribution} , #{iselectroniccode} , #{electroniccode} , #{electroniccodeunit} , #{electroniccodeurl} , #{drugqualitystandard} , #{surveyreportid} , #{surveyreportdate} , #{newdrugcode} , #{drugstandardcode} , #{drugansprm} , #{drugremark} , #{addtime} , #{adduserid} , #{drugformdescription} , #{middlepack} , #{bigpack} , #{drugorigin} , #{catalogtype} , #{isusing} , #{isurbmi} , #{isnrcms} , #{isemergencymedicine} , #{isclinicalsmall} , #{companynameTb} , #{drugcode} , #{drugtype} , #{drugenglishname} , #{drugsource} , #{mincompanyname} , #{materialno} , #{mindrugreportresult} , #{reportdate} , #{reportresult} , #{isentrust} , #{entrustcode} , #{entrustcompanyname} , #{electronicsupervision} , #{abroadcompanyname} , #{bidcompanyname} , #{drugcapacity} , #{medicalinsurancetype} , #{medicalinsurancecode} , #{pricetype} , #{governmentpricetype} , #{governmentprice} , #{isBasicDrug} , #{minPackUnit} , #{minReportCode} , #{id} , #{regid} , #{enteredcomname} , #{indication} , #{isgmpvaild} , #{entrustcompanyid} , #{regtype} , #{regperformstandard} , #{regperformstandardcode} , #{yields} , #{isdruglabel} , #{price} , #{comprice} , #{patenttype} , #{pack} , #{isusingreason} , #{medicinemodelstandard} , #{outlookcstandard} , #{goodsclassification} , #{hasinstructions} , #{haspack} , #{instructionsimg} , #{entityimg} , #{iscountryfamous} , #{isprovincefamous} , #{instructionsid} , #{entityid} , #{isbargaining} , #{maxretailprice} , #{farmgateprice} , #{retailprice} , #{nmpackprice} , #{isfzy} , #{isdjy} , #{isBasicDrugOld} , #{ypid} )

INSERT INTO TRADE_DRUGINFO ( DRUGID , PRODUCTID , DRUGNAMEID , DRUGNAME , DRUGGOODSNAME , DRUGFORMID , DRUGFORM , DRUGSPECID , DRUGSPEC , DRUGFACTOR , DRUGUNITID , DRUGUNIT , PREPARATIONUNITID , PREPARATIONUNIT , DRUGMATERIALID , DRUGMATERIAL , COMPANYID_TB , COMPANYID_SC , COMPANYNAME_SC , QUALITYLEVELSID , REGCARDID , SOURCEOFFEED , TYPECHARACTERISTICS , RESERVECONDITION , DRUGVALIDITY , DRUGROUTE , ISGMPNOTICE , GMPID , ISLISENCENOTICE , LISENCECODE , LICENSENUMBERDATE , INTERNATIONALCERTIFICATION , IMPORTCERTIFICATE , REGCODE , REGDATE , PRODUCTQUALITY , BUSINESSBRIBERY , DRUGDISTRIBUTION , ISELECTRONICCODE , ELECTRONICCODE , ELECTRONICCODEUNIT , ELECTRONICCODEURL , DRUGQUALITYSTANDARD , SURVEYREPORTID , SURVEYREPORTDATE , NEWDRUGCODE , DRUGSTANDARDCODE , DRUGANSPRM , DRUGREMARK , ADDTIME , ADDUSERID , DRUGFORMDESCRIPTION , MIDDLEPACK , BIGPACK , DRUGORIGIN , CATALOGTYPE , ISUSING , ISURBMI , ISNRCMS , ISEMERGENCYMEDICINE , ISCLINICALSMALL , COMPANYNAME_TB , DRUGCODE , DRUGTYPE , DRUGENGLISHNAME , DRUGSOURCE , MINCOMPANYNAME , MATERIALNO , MINDRUGREPORTRESULT , REPORTDATE , REPORTRESULT , ISENTRUST , ENTRUSTCODE , ENTRUSTCOMPANYNAME , ELECTRONICSUPERVISION , ABROADCOMPANYNAME , BIDCOMPANYNAME , DRUGCAPACITY , MEDICALINSURANCETYPE , MEDICALINSURANCECODE , PRICETYPE , GOVERNMENTPRICETYPE , GOVERNMENTPRICE , IS_BASIC_DRUG , MIN_PACK_UNIT , MIN_REPORT_CODE , ID , REGID , ENTEREDCOMNAME , INDICATION , ISGMPVAILD , ENTRUSTCOMPANYID , REGTYPE , REGPERFORMSTANDARD , REGPERFORMSTANDARDCODE , YIELDS , ISDRUGLABEL , PRICE , COMPRICE , PATENTTYPE , PACK , ISUSINGREASON , MEDICINEMODELSTANDARD , OUTLOOKCSTANDARD , GOODSCLASSIFICATION , HASINSTRUCTIONS , HASPACK , INSTRUCTIONSIMG , ENTITYIMG , ISCOUNTRYFAMOUS , ISPROVINCEFAMOUS , INSTRUCTIONSID , ENTITYID , ISBARGAINING , MAXRETAILPRICE , FARMGATEPRICE , RETAILPRICE , NMPACKPRICE , ISFZY , ISDJY , IS_BASIC_DRUG_OLD , YPID ) VALUES
( #{item.drugid}, #{item.productid}, #{item.drugnameid}, #{item.drugname}, #{item.druggoodsname}, #{item.drugformid}, #{item.drugform}, #{item.drugspecid}, #{item.drugspec}, #{item.drugfactor}, #{item.drugunitid}, #{item.drugunit}, #{item.preparationunitid}, #{item.preparationunit}, #{item.drugmaterialid}, #{item.drugmaterial}, #{item.companyidTb}, #{item.companyidSc}, #{item.companynameSc}, #{item.qualitylevelsid}, #{item.regcardid}, #{item.sourceoffeed}, #{item.typecharacteristics}, #{item.reservecondition}, #{item.drugvalidity}, #{item.drugroute}, #{item.isgmpnotice}, #{item.gmpid}, #{item.islisencenotice}, #{item.lisencecode}, #{item.licensenumberdate}, #{item.internationalcertification}, #{item.importcertificate}, #{item.regcode}, #{item.regdate}, #{item.productquality}, #{item.businessbribery}, #{item.drugdistribution}, #{item.iselectroniccode}, #{item.electroniccode}, #{item.electroniccodeunit}, #{item.electroniccodeurl}, #{item.drugqualitystandard}, #{item.surveyreportid}, #{item.surveyreportdate}, #{item.newdrugcode}, #{item.drugstandardcode}, #{item.drugansprm}, #{item.drugremark}, #{item.addtime}, #{item.adduserid}, #{item.drugformdescription}, #{item.middlepack}, #{item.bigpack}, #{item.drugorigin}, #{item.catalogtype}, #{item.isusing}, #{item.isurbmi}, #{item.isnrcms}, #{item.isemergencymedicine}, #{item.isclinicalsmall}, #{item.companynameTb}, #{item.drugcode}, #{item.drugtype}, #{item.drugenglishname}, #{item.drugsource}, #{item.mincompanyname}, #{item.materialno}, #{item.mindrugreportresult}, #{item.reportdate}, #{item.reportresult}, #{item.isentrust}, #{item.entrustcode}, #{item.entrustcompanyname}, #{item.electronicsupervision}, #{item.abroadcompanyname}, #{item.bidcompanyname}, #{item.drugcapacity}, #{item.medicalinsurancetype}, #{item.medicalinsurancecode}, #{item.pricetype}, #{item.governmentpricetype}, #{item.governmentprice}, #{item.isBasicDrug}, #{item.minPackUnit}, #{item.minReportCode}, #{item.id}, #{item.regid}, #{item.enteredcomname}, #{item.indication}, #{item.isgmpvaild}, #{item.entrustcompanyid}, #{item.regtype}, #{item.regperformstandard}, #{item.regperformstandardcode}, #{item.yields}, #{item.isdruglabel}, #{item.price}, #{item.comprice}, #{item.patenttype}, #{item.pack}, #{item.isusingreason}, #{item.medicinemodelstandard}, #{item.outlookcstandard}, #{item.goodsclassification}, #{item.hasinstructions}, #{item.haspack}, #{item.instructionsimg}, #{item.entityimg}, #{item.iscountryfamous}, #{item.isprovincefamous}, #{item.instructionsid}, #{item.entityid}, #{item.isbargaining}, #{item.maxretailprice}, #{item.farmgateprice}, #{item.retailprice}, #{item.nmpackprice}, #{item.isfzy}, #{item.isdjy}, #{item.isBasicDrugOld}, #{item.ypid} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TRADE_DRUGINFO
DRUGID = #{drugid},
PRODUCTID = #{productid},
DRUGNAMEID = #{drugnameid},
DRUGNAME = #{drugname},
DRUGGOODSNAME = #{druggoodsname},
DRUGFORMID = #{drugformid},
DRUGFORM = #{drugform},
DRUGSPECID = #{drugspecid},
DRUGSPEC = #{drugspec},
DRUGFACTOR = #{drugfactor},
DRUGUNITID = #{drugunitid},
DRUGUNIT = #{drugunit},
PREPARATIONUNITID = #{preparationunitid},
PREPARATIONUNIT = #{preparationunit},
DRUGMATERIALID = #{drugmaterialid},
DRUGMATERIAL = #{drugmaterial},
COMPANYID_TB = #{companyidTb},
COMPANYID_SC = #{companyidSc},
COMPANYNAME_SC = #{companynameSc},
QUALITYLEVELSID = #{qualitylevelsid},
REGCARDID = #{regcardid},
SOURCEOFFEED = #{sourceoffeed},
TYPECHARACTERISTICS = #{typecharacteristics},
RESERVECONDITION = #{reservecondition},
DRUGVALIDITY = #{drugvalidity},
DRUGROUTE = #{drugroute},
ISGMPNOTICE = #{isgmpnotice},
GMPID = #{gmpid},
ISLISENCENOTICE = #{islisencenotice},
LISENCECODE = #{lisencecode},
LICENSENUMBERDATE = #{licensenumberdate},
INTERNATIONALCERTIFICATION = #{internationalcertification},
IMPORTCERTIFICATE = #{importcertificate},
REGCODE = #{regcode},
REGDATE = #{regdate},
PRODUCTQUALITY = #{productquality},
BUSINESSBRIBERY = #{businessbribery},
DRUGDISTRIBUTION = #{drugdistribution},
ISELECTRONICCODE = #{iselectroniccode},
ELECTRONICCODE = #{electroniccode},
ELECTRONICCODEUNIT = #{electroniccodeunit},
ELECTRONICCODEURL = #{electroniccodeurl},
DRUGQUALITYSTANDARD = #{drugqualitystandard},
SURVEYREPORTID = #{surveyreportid},
SURVEYREPORTDATE = #{surveyreportdate},
NEWDRUGCODE = #{newdrugcode},
DRUGSTANDARDCODE = #{drugstandardcode},
DRUGANSPRM = #{drugansprm},
DRUGREMARK = #{drugremark},
ADDTIME = #{addtime},
ADDUSERID = #{adduserid},
DRUGFORMDESCRIPTION = #{drugformdescription},
MIDDLEPACK = #{middlepack},
BIGPACK = #{bigpack},
DRUGORIGIN = #{drugorigin},
CATALOGTYPE = #{catalogtype},
ISUSING = #{isusing},
ISURBMI = #{isurbmi},
ISNRCMS = #{isnrcms},
ISEMERGENCYMEDICINE = #{isemergencymedicine},
ISCLINICALSMALL = #{isclinicalsmall},
COMPANYNAME_TB = #{companynameTb},
DRUGCODE = #{drugcode},
DRUGTYPE = #{drugtype},
DRUGENGLISHNAME = #{drugenglishname},
DRUGSOURCE = #{drugsource},
MINCOMPANYNAME = #{mincompanyname},
MATERIALNO = #{materialno},
MINDRUGREPORTRESULT = #{mindrugreportresult},
REPORTDATE = #{reportdate},
REPORTRESULT = #{reportresult},
ISENTRUST = #{isentrust},
ENTRUSTCODE = #{entrustcode},
ENTRUSTCOMPANYNAME = #{entrustcompanyname},
ELECTRONICSUPERVISION = #{electronicsupervision},
ABROADCOMPANYNAME = #{abroadcompanyname},
BIDCOMPANYNAME = #{bidcompanyname},
DRUGCAPACITY = #{drugcapacity},
MEDICALINSURANCETYPE = #{medicalinsurancetype},
MEDICALINSURANCECODE = #{medicalinsurancecode},
PRICETYPE = #{pricetype},
GOVERNMENTPRICETYPE = #{governmentpricetype},
GOVERNMENTPRICE = #{governmentprice},
IS_BASIC_DRUG = #{isBasicDrug},
MIN_PACK_UNIT = #{minPackUnit},
MIN_REPORT_CODE = #{minReportCode},
REGID = #{regid},
ENTEREDCOMNAME = #{enteredcomname},
INDICATION = #{indication},
ISGMPVAILD = #{isgmpvaild},
ENTRUSTCOMPANYID = #{entrustcompanyid},
REGTYPE = #{regtype},
REGPERFORMSTANDARD = #{regperformstandard},
REGPERFORMSTANDARDCODE = #{regperformstandardcode},
YIELDS = #{yields},
ISDRUGLABEL = #{isdruglabel},
PRICE = #{price},
COMPRICE = #{comprice},
PATENTTYPE = #{patenttype},
PACK = #{pack},
ISUSINGREASON = #{isusingreason},
MEDICINEMODELSTANDARD = #{medicinemodelstandard},
OUTLOOKCSTANDARD = #{outlookcstandard},
GOODSCLASSIFICATION = #{goodsclassification},
HASINSTRUCTIONS = #{hasinstructions},
HASPACK = #{haspack},
INSTRUCTIONSIMG = #{instructionsimg},
ENTITYIMG = #{entityimg},
ISCOUNTRYFAMOUS = #{iscountryfamous},
ISPROVINCEFAMOUS = #{isprovincefamous},
INSTRUCTIONSID = #{instructionsid},
ENTITYID = #{entityid},
ISBARGAINING = #{isbargaining},
MAXRETAILPRICE = #{maxretailprice},
FARMGATEPRICE = #{farmgateprice},
RETAILPRICE = #{retailprice},
NMPACKPRICE = #{nmpackprice},
ISFZY = #{isfzy},
ISDJY = #{isdjy},
IS_BASIC_DRUG_OLD = #{isBasicDrugOld},
YPID = #{ypid},
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.DRUGID, t.PRODUCTID, t.DRUGNAMEID, t.DRUGNAME, t.DRUGGOODSNAME, t.DRUGFORMID, t.DRUGFORM, t.DRUGSPECID, t.DRUGSPEC, t.DRUGFACTOR, t.DRUGUNITID, t.DRUGUNIT, t.PREPARATIONUNITID, t.PREPARATIONUNIT, t.DRUGMATERIALID, t.DRUGMATERIAL, t.COMPANYID_TB, t.COMPANYID_SC, t.COMPANYNAME_SC, t.QUALITYLEVELSID, t.REGCARDID, t.SOURCEOFFEED, t.TYPECHARACTERISTICS, t.RESERVECONDITION, t.DRUGVALIDITY, t.DRUGROUTE, t.ISGMPNOTICE, t.GMPID, t.ISLISENCENOTICE, t.LISENCECODE, t.LICENSENUMBERDATE, t.INTERNATIONALCERTIFICATION, t.IMPORTCERTIFICATE, t.REGCODE, t.REGDATE, t.PRODUCTQUALITY, t.BUSINESSBRIBERY, t.DRUGDISTRIBUTION, t.ISELECTRONICCODE, t.ELECTRONICCODE, t.ELECTRONICCODEUNIT, t.ELECTRONICCODEURL, t.DRUGQUALITYSTANDARD, t.SURVEYREPORTID, t.SURVEYREPORTDATE, t.NEWDRUGCODE, t.DRUGSTANDARDCODE, t.DRUGANSPRM, t.DRUGREMARK, t.ADDTIME, t.ADDUSERID, t.DRUGFORMDESCRIPTION, t.MIDDLEPACK, t.BIGPACK, t.DRUGORIGIN, d.sortname CATALOGTYPE, t.ISUSING, t.ISURBMI, t.ISNRCMS, t.ISEMERGENCYMEDICINE, t.ISCLINICALSMALL, t.COMPANYNAME_TB, t.DRUGCODE, t.DRUGTYPE, t.DRUGENGLISHNAME, t.DRUGSOURCE, t.MINCOMPANYNAME, t.MATERIALNO, t.MINDRUGREPORTRESULT, t.REPORTDATE, t.REPORTRESULT, t.ISENTRUST, t.ENTRUSTCODE, t.ENTRUSTCOMPANYNAME, t.ELECTRONICSUPERVISION, t.ABROADCOMPANYNAME, t.BIDCOMPANYNAME, t.DRUGCAPACITY, t.MEDICALINSURANCETYPE, t.MEDICALINSURANCECODE, t.PRICETYPE, t.GOVERNMENTPRICETYPE, t.GOVERNMENTPRICE, t.IS_BASIC_DRUG, t.MIN_PACK_UNIT, t.MIN_REPORT_CODE, t.ID, t.REGID, t.ENTEREDCOMNAME, t.INDICATION, t.ISGMPVAILD, t.ENTRUSTCOMPANYID, t.REGTYPE, t.REGPERFORMSTANDARD, t.REGPERFORMSTANDARDCODE, t.YIELDS, t.ISDRUGLABEL, t.PRICE, t.COMPRICE, t.PATENTTYPE, t.PACK, t.ISUSINGREASON, t.MEDICINEMODELSTANDARD, t.OUTLOOKCSTANDARD, t.GOODSCLASSIFICATION, t.HASINSTRUCTIONS, t.HASPACK, t.INSTRUCTIONSIMG, t.ENTITYIMG, t.ISCOUNTRYFAMOUS, t.ISPROVINCEFAMOUS, t.INSTRUCTIONSID, t.ENTITYID, t.ISBARGAINING, t.MAXRETAILPRICE, t.FARMGATEPRICE, t.RETAILPRICE, t.NMPACKPRICE, t.ISFZY, t.ISDJY, t.IS_BASIC_DRUG_OLD, t.YPID, t.ISPILOT, C.LASTUPDATETIME FROM TRADE_DRUGINFO T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT L.DATAID,MAX(L.CHANGETIME) LASTUPDATETIME FROM SYS_CGCHANGELOG L WHERE L.CHANGETYPE='BASE_DRUGINFO' GROUP BY L.DATAID) C ON T.ID=C.DATAID LEFT JOIN BASE_SORT d ON d.ID = t.CATALOGTYPE
AND t.DRUGID in(
#{item} )
AND c.LASTUPDATETIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND c.LASTUPDATETIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY C.LASTUPDATETIME , T.DRUGID DESC
